review.title: “Decent place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Interesting projects. Some are in IT, including crypto. Some are in manufactoring.and aircraft depo. San Antonio is a great family town.
review.cons: Cons – Small company. There is virtually no room for promotion. All new postions are hired in from the outside. Compensation package is on the low side. Standard 2 week vacation. low IRA matching and bonus.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The company should invest in a training program to keep employee certifications, current if they have them, and encourage those members without to obtain them.
